BadgeDetail.Name: Activist
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge is a dedicated campaigner for making social change.

Task.Title: Campaign
Task.Body: Upload evidence demonstrating your activism. This could be the form of a letter to a newspaper or politician, creating an online petition or attending rallies.
